steps.processorData:
select
    a/name/value,
    a/context/start_time/value as created,
    e/ehr_id/value as ehr_id,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value as mrn,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/namespace as authority,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value as assessment_date
from EHR e contains
top 1
COMPOSITION a
contains
    EVALUATION a_a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.critical_care_pre_referral_information.v0]
where a/archetype_details/template_id/value='Critical Care Pre Referral Information'
order by created desc
offset 0 limit 100000
